UserOverviewStats¶

class Sakurajima.models.user_models.UserOverviewStats(data_dict)¶

Hold data regarding the watch stats of a user.

mean_score¶

The mean score that the user has given to different shows

ratings¶

The total number of shows that the user has rated.

total¶

The total number of shows that the user has watched, this includes all categories like anime, movie annd special etc.

total_episodes¶

The total number of episodes that the user has watched. Includes episodes from all categories.

watched_days¶

The total watch time of a user in days.

watched_hours¶

The total watch time of a user in hours.
